{{Infobox dungeon |name = Shoal Cave |image = [[File:Shoal Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Shoal Cave |tokens = 28,000 |location = On Route 135, North of Mossdeep City. }} '''Shoal Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]].
It is 7x7 in size (49 tiles in total), contain 6 chests, 17 non-boss encounters, 1 boss encounter and 25 empty tiles ==Details== ===Dungeon Stats=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 290,000 |- | Boss || 900,000 |} ===Pokémon=== * Zubat * Golbat * Spheal * Tentacool * Magikarp * Wailmer * Snorunt (boss) ===Items=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |} [[Category:Dungeons]]
